survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and user satisfaction of AI-powered virtual classroom platforms used in educational institutions.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered virtual classroom platform have you used in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for better user experience on mobile devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice dropdown with 'Other' as an open-text option.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered virtual classroom platform have you used in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI features in your virtual classroom platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI features in your virtual classroom platform?

questions.question_text: Which AI features do you find most useful in your virtual classroom platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse user preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Other' as an open-text option.

script.question_text: Which AI features do you find most useful in your virtual classroom platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has the AI-powered virtual classroom platform improved your learning or teaching experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a text box with a 500-character limit to encourage concise responses.

script.question_text: How has the AI-powered virtual classroom platform improved your learning or teaching experience?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with the AI features in your virtual classroom platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with the AI features in your virtual classroom platform?

questions.question_text: What additional AI features would you like to see in virtual classroom platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a text box with a 500-character limit to encourage concise responses.

script.question_text: What additional AI features would you like to see in virtual classroom platforms?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI-powered virtual classroom platform to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI-powered virtual classroom platform to a colleague?
